product_summary: Hermeso is an AI-powered travel assistant that helps you plan and book your perfect trip. With Hermeso, you can easily explore destinations, compare prices, and book flights, hotels, and activities all in one place. Hermeso also provides personalized recommendations based on your preferences and budget, and can even help you create a custom itinerary for your trip.
product_pros: Can help you create a custom itinerary
product_cons: Can be overwhelming for some users
May not be as comprehensive as some other travel planning tools
May not be suitable for all types of trips
Can be difficult to cancel or change reservations

product_usecases.details: Hermeso can help you plan your entire vacation, from choosing a destination to booking flights, hotels, and activities.

product_usecases.usecase: Finding the best deals on travel
product_usecases.details: Hermeso can help you compare prices on flights, hotels, and activities to find the best deals.
Hermeso can provide you with personalized recommendations based on your preferences and budget.
Hermeso can help you create a custom itinerary for your trip, including suggested activities and dining options.
Hermeso allows you to book flights, hotels, and activities all in one place.

product_toolfor.details: Hermeso is a great tool for travelers of all types, from budget backpackers to luxury travelers.
Hermeso can help travel agents save time and money by providing them with access to a comprehensive search engine and personalized recommendations.
Hermeso can help businesses save money on travel expenses by providing them with access to exclusive discounts and deals.
Hermeso can help event planners plan and book travel for their attendees.
Hermeso is a great tool for anyone who wants to travel, regardless of their budget or experience level.

product_pricing: Hermeso offers a variety of pricing plans to fit your needs. The basic plan is free to use, and the premium plan starts at $99 per year. The premium plan includes access to exclusive discounts and deals, as well as personalized recommendations and itinerary planning.
